title: Perfect Harmony Stress Relief Formula for Women by Success Chemistry - Anti Anxiety and Panic Aid with Natural Ingredients - Ashwagandha, Chamomile, GABA, and More - 60 Capsules
descriptionHtml:
Discover Perfect Harmony, the ultimate Stress Relief Formula for Women designed to combat anxiety and promote calmness. Our proprietary blend includes powerful natural ingredients that work synergistically to reduce stress, enhance mood, and support overall well-being. Perfect for managing stress during important events, travel, or daily challenges, Perfect Harmony provides a natural approach to anxiety relief without the side effects of prescription drugs.

Key Benefits of Perfect Harmony Stress Relief Formula

Reduces Stress and Anxiety: Rhodiola Crenulata Extract and Ashwagandha help reduce stress levels and promote a calm mind. Promotes Relaxation: Chamomile, Lemon Balm, and Passion Flower enhance relaxation and help alleviate anxiety symptoms. Supports Mood Enhancement: GABA, Bacopa, and St. John’s Wort boost mood and support emotional well-being. Enhances Cognitive Function: Bacopa and L-Theanine support cognitive function and help maintain focus. Improves Overall Well-Being: Ingredients like Chinese Skullcap, Chinese Hawthorn, and Magnolia contribute to overall health and well-being.

Ingredients:

  • Rhodiola Crenulata Extract (Rhodiola crenulata) (root): Reduces stress and enhances mood.
  • Ashwagandha (Withania somnifera) (root): Supports mood enhancement and reduces anxiety.
  • Chamomile (Matricaria chamomilla) (flower): Promotes relaxation and reduces stress.
  • Gamma-Aminobutyric Acid (GABA): Supports a calm mind and reduces anxiety.
  • Lemon Balm (Melissa officinalis) (aerial): Reduces stress and promotes relaxation.
  • Chinese Skullcap (Scutellaria baicalensis) (root): Provides anti-inflammatory and stress-relieving benefits.
  • Chinese Hawthorn (Crataegus pinnatifida Bunge) (fruit): Supports cardiovascular health and reduces anxiety.
  • Bacopa (Bacopa monnieri) (whole herb): Enhances cognitive function and supports mental clarity.
  • Magnolia (Magnolia officinalis) (bark): Promotes relaxation and reduces stress.
  • Passion Flower (Passiflora incarnata) (flower): Alleviates anxiety and promotes relaxation.
  • Valerian (Valeriana officinalis) (root): Promotes relaxation and improves sleep quality.
  • L-Theanine: Supports mental clarity and reduces stress.
  • Oat Straw (Avena sativa) (straw): Supports overall well-being and reduces stress.
  • Mucuna Pruriens (seed): Enhances mood and supports mental health.
  • St. John’s Wort (Hypericum perforatum) (aerial): Boosts mood and reduces symptoms of anxiety.
  • Hops (Humulus lupulus) (flower): Promotes relaxation and reduces anxiety.
  • 5-HTP (Griffonia simplicifolia) (seed): Supports serotonin production and enhances mood.

Why Choose Perfect Harmony Stress Relief Formula for Women by Success Chemistry?

  • High-Quality Ingredients: Our formula includes a blend of premium natural ingredients known for their effectiveness in reducing stress and enhancing mood.
  • Natural and Safe: Made with natural ingredients, our supplement is free from artificial additives, preservatives, and common allergens.
  • Comprehensive Stress Relief Support: Provides a wide range of benefits, including stress reduction, mood enhancement, and overall well-being support.
  • Convenient and Effective: Each bottle contains 60 easy-to-swallow capsules, providing a one-month supply when taken as directed.

Achieve Perfect Harmony Naturally

Incorporate Success Chemistry's Perfect Harmony Stress Relief Formula into your daily routine to manage stress, reduce anxiety, and promote overall well-being. Experience the comprehensive benefits of our advanced stress relief formula and embrace a calmer, more balanced life naturally.
shortDescriptionHtml: Discover Perfect Harmony Stress Relief Formula for Women by Success Chemistry. Our natural formula with Ashwagandha, Chamomile, GABA, and more reduces anxiety, promotes calmness, and enhances mood. 60 capsules per bottle.
supplementFacts:
Supplement Facts
Serving Size: 2 Capsules
Servings Per Container: 30

Amount Per Serving / %DV
Calcium (as Calcium Carbonate) 18 mg 1%
Vitamin B6 (Pyridoxine HCl) 1.8 mg 106%
Magnesium (as Magnesium Citrate) 13 mg 3%
Formula Proprietary Blend: 1071 mg **
L-Tryptophan, Valerian (Valeriana officinalis) (root), Goji (Wolfberry) (Lycium barbarum) (berry), Chamomile (Matricaria chamomilla) (flower), Lemon Balm (Melissa officinalis) (aerial), Passion Flower (Passiflora incarnata) (flower), L-Taurine, Hops (Humulus lupulus) (flower), St. John's Wort (Hypericum perforatum) (aerial), GABA (Gamma aminobutyric acid), Skullcap (Scutellaria baicalensis) (root), L-Theanine, Ashwagandha (Withania somnifera) (root), Inositol, 5-HTP (Griffonia simplicifolia) (seed), Melatonin.

** Daily Value (DV) not established

Inactive Ingredients: Cellulose (Vegetable Capsule), Magnesium Stearate (Vegetable), Silicon Dioxide.
